mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments VALUES (#{diaryNo}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(comment_no), 0) + 1 FROM comments WHERE diary_no = #{diaryNo}), #{client.clientId}, #{commentContent}, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE comments SET comment_content = #{commentContent}, comment_writing_time = TO_DATE(SYSDATE) WHERE client_id = #{client.clientId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM comments WHERE diary_no = #{diaryNo} AND comment_no = #{commentNo}
